message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IOT, cs.CR 

The paper focuses on the development of a computer vision-based surveillance system using deep learning and IoT technology to address safety and security-related needs at production sites. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also extensively uses deep learning techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely categories as well. The use of IoT technology also makes cs.IOT (Internet of Things) a possible category. Finally, the paper also addresses security-related issues, which makes cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a possible category.
